Title: Hired Guns
Plot: Lori and Brad defend a woman who is accused of murdering her husband and his mistress while they were in bed together.  Alan's life is endangered when he helps a woman whose ex-husband plans to kidnap their children.
GuestStars: Megan Ward,  Rocky Carroll,  Jodi Lyn O'Keefe,  Yeniffer Behrens,  Daniel Edward Mora,  Ed O'Ross,  John Kapelos,  Ming Lo,  Aaron Lustig,  Scott Conte,  Charles Emmett,  Blair Bess,  Michael C. Alexander,  John
